title: Life in hot wet lands: the Congo Basin
brief_description: Set in the Congo Basin, this film illustrates how climate influences the lives of people who live in hot, wet lands. Follows the daily activities of a jungle boy and his family showing how they adapt their clothing, shelters, social activities and food gathering to the geographical region in which they live.
